title: Patch 5.13 won't update
body:
OK I have a question 
patch 5.13 went out like in the bottom right corner i can see 5.13
but i can launch the league without patching it and when i launched it non of the new changes were added.
Does someody have an answer ?
Thank you in advance <3

replies.body:
My patch stay at 33% 
Need help

The same problem i'ts been for they even before the new patch keep out i reinstall my pc and it has been 5 days now if i'm not mistaken, it stays at 33% one time it teach 60 something but it keeps failing and stay on 33%
As others have mentioned, we ran into an issue that's since been resolved, and the patch will be rolling out a day later than usual.
My launcher wont even load to where i can click launch to go to the log in screen how can i fix it?

> We’ve run into a last-minute issue with patch 5.13 that needs to be fixed before we can ship the new patch out to you. Our original release timeline has been postponed. We’ll update you as soon as we can with information on our progress, as well as a new timeline once it’s been established.

Found at the [service status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na)

Ok guys thank you
and if some news are out please reply to this reply :D
So, they've just updated it..the patch will be loaded tonight. ^^
Because the patch update hasn't even came yet. It's tomorrow.
Does anyone still have the update issue? Mines still not allowing me to update :(
I'm more than certain the patch is coming out today. *Even check the latest notes on Surrender at 20* though for whatever reason it's not updating just yet.
